overview: The story of turmoil in a household is told by a wife who is having an affair with another man. The man he was having an affair with turned out to be a Satanist who always sacrificed anyone asked by the devil as a sacrifice to get wealth. Finally, his wife and children became sacrifices and became ghosts wandering around and wanted revenge for the behavior of the husband who had made sacrifices for his worship.
title: Kuntilanak Merah Pentagram
